name: BEZAFIBRATE
cautions: Cautions correct hypothyroidism before initiating treatment (see Lipid-regulating drugs); interactions: Appendix 1 (fibrates)
side-effects:
Side-effects gastro-intestinal disturbances, anorexia; less commonly cholestasis, weight gain, dizziness, headache,
fatigue, drowsiness, renal impairment, raised serum creatinine (unrelated
to renal impairment), erectile dysfunction, myotoxicity (with myasthenia
or myalgia)—special risk in renal impairment (see Cautions), urticaria,
pruritus, photosensitivity reactions; very rarely gallstones, hypoglycaemia, anaemia, leucopenia, thrombocytopenia,
increased platelet count, alopecia, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, and
toxic epidermal necrolysis
pregnancy: Pregnancy manufacturers advise avoid—embryotoxicity in animal studies
